name: Full Screen Popup
author: xyzscripts.com

sections.description:
A quicklook into Full Screen Popup

★ Create a responsive light weight full page popup
★ Full control on popup content
★ Standard WordPress content editor
★ Timeout based popup display
★ Display based on browsed number of pages
★ Css settings like color, z-index, border etc
★ Option to exclude dialog box for logged in users
★ Shortcode for displaying popup in specific pages
★ Display specificaly in pages/posts/home page

This plugin allows you to create a full screen popup window with custom content in your site. You can customize the popup display by configuring various settings such as display logic settings (trigger based on timeout after page load, based on number of pages browsed, popup repeat interval) and style settings(z-index, color, border etc). The plugin supports automatic and manual (shortcode) display. You can use the plugin to display any type of contents such as special promotions, subscription forms, social media icons, feedback forms, video presentations and much more.

Want more features ?

Check out the premium version of this plugin.

About

Full Screen Popup is developed and maintained by XYZScripts. For any support, you may contact us.

★ Full Screen Popup User Guide
★ Full Screen Popup FAQ

More Information

★ Full Screen Popup User Guide
★ Full Screen Popup FAQ

Troubleshooting

Please read the FAQ first if you are having problems.

Requirements

Server

WordPress 2.8+
PHP 5+ (Recommended)

Client

IE 7+, FireFox 2+, Chrome, Safari 3+, Opera 8+

Feedback

We would like to receive your feedback and suggestions for the betterment of this plugin. You may submit them at our support desk.
sections.installation:
★ Full Screen Popup User Guide
★ Full Screen Popup FAQ

  1. Extract full-screen-popup.zip to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. In the admin panel under plugins activate Full Screen Popup.
  3. You can configure the settings from XYZ Full Screen Popup menu.
  4. It should now be completely set up and functional.

If you need any further help, you may contact our support desk.
sections.faq:
★ Full Screen Popup User Guide
★ Full Screen Popup FAQ

Installation Instructions

★ Full Screen Popup User Guide
★ Full Screen Popup FAQ

  1. Extract full-screen-popup.zip to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. In the admin panel under plugins activate Full Screen Popup.
  3. You can configure the settings from XYZ Full Screen Popup menu.
  4. It should now be completely set up and functional.

If you need any further help, you may contact our support desk.

1. What is a “full screen popup” ?

A full screen popup is used to display any content inside a popup within a webpage, while rest of the page is hidden. It is normally used to show subscription forms, contact forms, promotions, etc

2. The Full Screen Popup plugin is not working properly

Please check the wordpress version you are using. Make sure it meets the minimum version recommended by us. Make sure all files of the Full Screen Popup plugin are uploaded to the folder wp-content/plugins/

3. Can I use this plugin with other popup plugins ?

You can use it with any other popup related plugins from XYZScripts. However it may interfere with popup plugins from other vendors.

4. Can I set repeat interval in minutes ?

Yes, you can set repeat interval in hours as well as minutes.

5. What kind of contents can be placed in a popup?

You may use the popup to display any type of contents such as special promotions, subscription forms, feedback forms, video presentations and much more.

6. Can I display popup in specific pages only ?

Yes, you can do this by using the shortcode provided from settings page.

7. Does it work with caching plugins ?

You can turn on compatibility with cache plugins from settings page. Please note that since this method uses ajax, the popup will be a rendered a bit slower than in normal mode.

8. Can I create multiple popup boxes for different pages ?

You need to purchase the premium version for having this feature.

9. Can I disable full screen popup box for logged in users ?

Yes, you can configure it by changing the value of “Do not show popup for logged in users ?” in settings page.

More questions ? Drop a mail and we shall get back to you with the answers.
sections.changelog:
1.2.2

  • Option to exclude popup for logged in users.
  • Option to change popup background opacity.

1.2.1

  • Nonces added
  • Data validations updated
  • Direct access prevented in all plugin files
  • the_editor() changed to wp_editor()
  • get_currentuserinfo() changed to wp_get_current_user()
  • ‘htmledit_pre’ hook changed to ‘format_for_editor’ for fixing Tinymce formatting issue
  • A few other bug fixes

1.2

  • Responsive full screen popup
  • Fixed a few bugs

1.1

  • Display specifically in pages/posts/home page.
  • Enable/disable premium version ads.
  • Option to enable/disable popup.
  • Compatibility with cache plugins.
  • Network installation support.

1.0

  • First official launch.

short_description: Create a javascript based, light-weight and non-annoying responsive full screen popup box in your blog.
